snippet: At the gatherings, the president, who will formally open his re-election campaign on Saturday, and a tight circle of advisers gird for the coming battle with Mitt Romney.
abstract: Pres Obama meets with a group of close advisers every other Sunday for a confidential briefing on the status of his re-election campaign; previously undisclosed meetings are designed to bridge a divide between his campaign headquarters in Chicago and his aides in Washington.
lead_paragraph: At the gatherings, the president, who will formally open his re-election campaign on Saturday, and a tight circle of advisers gird for the coming battle with Mitt Romney.

headline.seo: At Sunday Meetings, Team Obama Prepares for a Tough Fight
headline.main: On Sundays, Tight Obama Circle Sizes Up Election
headline.print_headline: At Sunday Meetings, Team Obama Prepares For a Grueling Fight
